alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 430 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Homestead Base, or over Homestead Miami Speedway, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homestead, Homestead Miami Speedway, Black Point, Homestead Base, Naranja, Homestead Bayfront Park, Leisure City, Princeton and Cutler Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County
